com.blockhaus2000.util

Class PluginUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blockhaus2000.util.PluginUtil

  • public class PluginUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a utility class for easy disableing and enabling of Bukkit (!) plugins.
    Author:
    Blockhaus2000

      PluginUtil()

        public PluginUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • disable

        public static void disable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
           java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> messages)
        Disables the given Plugin and sends the given messages. The messages are send with the usage of ChatOut.log(java.util.Collection). Will call PluginManager.disablePlugin(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin that has to be disabled.
        messages - The messages that has to be send.
        See Also:
        ChatOut.log(java.util.Collection), PluginManager.disablePlugin(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)

      • disable

        public static void disable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Disables the given plugin. Will call disable(Plugin, Collection) with messages = null.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin that has to be disabled.
        See Also:
        disable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin, java.util.Collection)

      • enable

        public static void enable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
          java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> messages)
        Enables the given Plugin and sends the given messages. The messages are send with the usage of ChatOut.log(java.util.Collection). Will call PluginManager.enablePlugin(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin that has to be disabled.
        messages - The messages that has to be send.
        See Also:
        ChatOut.log(java.util.Collection), PluginManager.enablePlugin(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)

      • enable

        public static void enable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Enables the given plugin. Will call enable(Plugin, Collection) with messages = null.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin that has to be disabled.
        See Also:
        enable(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin, java.util.Collection)
